description: Francis Ford Coppola's epic draws parallels between the U.S. and ancient Rome. Forty-some years in the making, it's got wild sex, startling violence, horse-drawn chariots and even nightclub unicorns.
title: Whatever you’ve heard about 'Megalopolis,' see this gutsy Coppola film for yourself

description: Two new films seem to be in dialogue: In The Substance, Demi Moore is a Hollywood star chasing eternal youth. The dark comedy A Different Man centers on a New Yorker with a rare genetic condition.
title: See 'The Substance' and 'A Different Man' together for a major makeover meditation

description: In an extraordinary operation, federal agents descended upon the mayor’s home early Thursday morning.
title: Read the unsealed indictment and charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams

description: Kotb has been at NBC for 26 years, including on the Dateline and Today programs. She said she decided to leave her role after she recently turned 60.
title: Hoda Kotb announces she is leaving NBC's 'Today' show

description: Helene strengthened into a Category 2 hurricane as it nears northwest Florida, where it is poised to make landfall late Thursday. It's forecast to bring heavy wind and rain hundreds of miles inland.
title: An intensifying Helene approaches Florida as southeastern states brace for impact

description: RT was long known to be a source of Russian propaganda. But a recent indictment of two employees for covertly funneling $10 million to pro-Trump influencers shines a light on its covert activities.
title: How Russia’s RT went from a cable news clone to covert operator

description: A court ruled Thursday that an 88-year-old former boxer was not guilty in a retrial for a 1966 quadruple murder. He spent 48 years behind bars, making him the world's longest-serving death row inmate.
title: Japanese court acquits a man in a 1966 murder retrial after decades on death row

description: The zoo has agreed with Chinese authorities to return two giant pandas to China more than eight years ahead of schedule because they have become too expensive to maintain amid declining visitors.
title: A zoo in Finland is returning pandas to China because they're too expensive to keep
